mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, a.* FROM ( SELECT n.id AS id, n.freeBoard_isTop, n.member_id AS member_id, a.member_login_Id, a.member_name, n.freeBoard_title, n.freeBoard_content, n.freeBoard_date, n.freeBoard_update_date, n.freeBoard_file_name, n.freeBoard_hit, n.freeBoard_head, n.freeBoard_ban FROM freeboard n JOIN member a ON n.member_id = a.id ORDER BY n.freeBoard_isTop DESC, n.freeBoard_date DESC, n.id ASC ) a ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

select * from freeboard where
freeBoard_title like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' or freeBoard_content like'%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
${category} like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
select * from freeboard where id = (select prev_id from (select id,freeBoard_title, lead(id,1,-1) over(ORDER BY id desc) as prev_id from freeboard) where id = #{id})
select * from freeboard where id = (select next_id from (select id,freeboard_title, lag(id,1,-1) over(ORDER BY id desc) as next_id from freeboard) where id = #{id})
mapper.update: update freeboard set freeBoard_hit = freeBoard_hit + 1 where id = #{id}

update freeboard set freeBoard_title = #{freeBoard_title}, freeBoard_content = #{freeBoard_content}, freeBoard_update_date = sysdate, freeBoard_file_name = #{freeBoard_file_name}, freeBoard_head = #{freeBoard_head}, freeBoard_ban = #{freeBoard_ban} where id = #{id}
update freeboard set freeBoard_ban = #{freeBoard_ban} where id = #{id}
